differences.actualValue: <speak>In a few words, how can I help you with your current order. You can say things like, the order was already picked up by someone else, ore, problem with customers address.</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>I think you're calling to cancel a delivery, is that correct?</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>I see that you're on your way to the pick up location. So I can better understand why you'd like to cancel, are you having trouble finding the store, <break time="400ms"/> is the location too far, <break time="400ms"/> or, having problem parking your car? You can also say, it is something else.</speak>

text: <speak>I see that you're on your way to the pick up location. You can also say, it is something else.</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>Got it. Upfront fares are based on many factors, including but not limited to the distance travelled to pick up an order. If you are unable, or unwilling to pick up this order, you can cancel the order yourself in the app. In the future, you can see the pickup and drop off locations before you accept the order, and use that to decide if you want to accept the order.</speak><speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

text: <speak>Got it. Upfront fares are based on many factors, including but not limited to the distance travelled to pick up an order. If you are unable, or unwilling to pick up this order, you can cancel the order yourself in the app. In the future, you can see the pickup and drop off locations before you accept the order, and use that to decide if you want to accept the order.</speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

agentUtterance.text:
<speak>Got it. Upfront fares are based on many factors, including but not limited to the distance travelled to pick up an order. If you are unable, or unwilling to pick up this order, you can cancel the order yourself in the app. In the future, you can see the pickup and drop off locations before you accept the order, and use that to decide if you want to accept the order.</speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>
